mapper.sql: id, BusinessNoticeNo, ReservationTime, CustomName, PickupAddress, CustomCode, Linkman, TelPhone, Weight, Volume, ImportantHints, ArriveCity, PickerInfo, SendAddress, ProcessingUnit, NotificationSource, CustomNoModifyFlag, SingleType, PackagesNum, ActualWeight, BillingWeight, PackingFee, ActualPacking
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from acc_businessadmissibility
order by ${orderByClause}

select ab.BusinessNoticeNo abBusinessNoticeNo,ReservationTime,CustomName,PickupAddress,CustomCode,Linkman,TelPhone,ImportantHints,ArriveCity,PickerInfo,SendAddress,ProcessingUnit,NotificationSource,CustomNoModifyFlag,SingleType, aw.BusinessNoticeNo awBusinessNoticeNo,JobNo,JobType,PickupStatus,ShortMessageInt,WorkGenerationTime,AfterSingleNum,PickupUnit,PickupTime, sd.`name`,su.username from acc_businessadmissibility ab INNER JOIN acc_workorder aw ON ab.BusinessNoticeNo = aw.BusinessNoticeNo INNER JOIN sys_dept sd ON ab.ProcessingUnit = sd.id INNER JOIN sys_user su ON ab.PickerInfo = su.id where aw.JobType <> 3 and aw.PickupStatus <> 3;
mapper.insert: insert into acc_businessadmissibility (id, BusinessNoticeNo, ReservationTime, CustomName, PickupAddress, CustomCode, Linkman, TelPhone, Weight, Volume, ImportantHints, ArriveCity, PickerInfo, SendAddress, ProcessingUnit, NotificationSource, CustomNoModifyFlag, SingleType, PackagesNum, ActualWeight, BillingWeight, PackingFee, ActualPacking ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessnoticeno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reservationtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{customname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickupaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{importanthints,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrivecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickerinfo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sendaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processingunit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{notificationsource,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customnomodifyflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{singletype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packagesnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actualweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{billingweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{packingfee,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{actualpacking,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
